attributes.action: Control the level of house to house callers .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
House to house calling should be controlled by the issue of licences approved by local councils.

Bogus Callers ( and high pressure salespeople ) play on the weakness of the elderly and those who live on their own.

The licence should clearly state that no house calling should take place after the official " lighting up time " published daily in national newspapers
